title: Watergate at 50: the making of an American scandal
itunes:title: Watergate at 50: the making of an American scandal
itunes:subtitle: Clifford Williamson charts the twists and turns of the conspiracy that sparked a constitutional crisis â€“ and brought down a president
description:
Half a century on from the Watergate scandal, Clifford Williamson explores its twists and turns, its key players, and its lasting impact on American politics. Speaking with Matt Elton, he explains how the conspiracy sparked a constitutional crisis that brought down a president.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
